section.p: This template represents planned medication activities. The priority of the medication activity to the patient and provider is communicated through Priority Preference. The effectiveTime indicates the time when the medication activity is intended to take place. The authorTime indicates when the documentation of the plan occurred.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-30465, CONF:1098-30466, CONF:1098-32557 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.42"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.42)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Planned moodCode (SubstanceAdministration/Supply) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.24 STATIC 2011-09-30 (CONF:1098-8573)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-32087)/@code="active" Active (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-32088)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1098-32066)
In a Planned Medication Activity, repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Route FDA Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.7 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32067)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] approachSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32078)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:1098-32068)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] rateQuantity (CONF:1098-32079)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] maxDoseQuantity (CONF:1098-32080)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] administrationUnitCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet AdministrableDrugForm 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14570 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32081)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable such that it (CONF:1098-32082)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Medication Information2 (CONF:1098-32083)

MAY contain [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-30470)
The clinician who is expected to perform the medication activity could be identified using substanceAdministration/performer.
Conforms to Performer2 from CDA

SHOULD contain [0..1] author such that it (CONF:1098-32046)
The author in a planned medication activity represents the clinician who is requesting or planning the medication activity.
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31104, CONF:1098-31105, CONF:1098-31106)
The following entryRelationship represents the priority that a patient or a provider places on the planned medication activity.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Priority Preference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32069, CONF:1098-32070, CONF:1098-32071)
The following entryRelationship represents the indication for the planned medication activity.
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32072, CONF:1098-32073, CONF:1098-32074)
The following entryRelationship captures any instructions associated with the planned medication activity.
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition such that it (CONF:1098-32084)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CONF:1098-32085)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Precondition For Substance Administration2 (CONF:1098-32086)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="IVL_TS" or contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:NEW, DSTU:1045)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] low (CONF:NEW, DSTU:1045)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:NEW, DSTU:1045)
If an effectiveTime is present with @xsi:type="IVL_TS" or @xsi:type="TS", this effectiveTime SHALL contain either a low or a @value but not both (CONF:NEW, DSTU:1045)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" (CONF:NEW, DSTU:1045)
SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.42)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8572, R2.0=CONF:1098-8572)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Planned moodCode (SubstanceAdministration/Supply) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.24 STATIC 2011-09-30 (CONF:1098-8573)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8575, R2.0=CONF:1098-8575)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-32087)/@code="active" Active (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-32088)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1098-32066)
In a Planned Medication Activity, repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Route FDA Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.7 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32067)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] approachSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32078)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:1098-32068)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] rateQuantity (CONF:1098-32079)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] maxDoseQuantity (CONF:1098-32080)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] administrationUnitCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet AdministrableDrugForm 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14570 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32081)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable such that it (CONF:1098-32082)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Medication Information2 (CONF:1098-32083)

MAY contain [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-30470)
Conforms to Performer2 from CDA
The clinician who is expected to perform the medication activity could be identified using substanceAdministration/performer.

SHOULD contain [0..1] author such that it (CONF:1098-32046)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
The author in a planned medication activity represents the clinician who is requesting or planning the medication activity.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31104, CONF:1098-31105, CONF:1098-31106)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Priority Preference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143)
The following entryRelationship represents the priority that a patient or a provider places on the planned medication activity.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32069, CONF:1098-32070, CONF:1098-32071)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)
The following entryRelationship represents the indication for the planned medication activity.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32072, CONF:1098-32073, CONF:1098-32074)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)
The following entryRelationship captures any instructions associated with the planned medication activity.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition such that it (CONF:1098-32084)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CONF:1098-32085)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Precondition For Substance Administration2 (CONF:1098-32086)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="IVL_TS" or contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:NEW, DSTU:1045)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] low (CONF:NEW, DSTU:1045)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:NEW, DSTU:1045)
If an effectiveTime is present with @xsi:type="IVL_TS" or @xsi:type="TS", this effectiveTime SHALL contain either a low or a @value but not both (CONF:NEW, DSTU:1045)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" (CONF:NEW, DSTU:1045)

codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <approachSiteCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <approachSiteCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1963824910"/> <manufacturedMaterial> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.88" codeSystemName="RxNorm"/> </manufacturedMaterial> </manufacturedProduct> </consumable> <performer/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1562309615"/> <code <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="51181173"/> <code <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1255104495"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </act> </entryRelationship> <precondition typeCode="PRCN"> <criterion> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.25" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.25"/> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" codeSystemName="HL7ActCode" displayName="Assertion"/> <text>Text Value</text> </criterion> </precondition> </substanceadministration>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8574, CONF:10514 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.42"
SHALL conform to CDA Substance Administration
Consol Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8572, R2.0=CONF:1098-8572)

Consol Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Planned moodCode (SubstanceAdministration/Supply) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.24 STATIC (CONF:8573)
Consol Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8575, R2.0=CONF:1098-8575)
